name: S/MIME Compressed Email Message
summary: Learn about .P7Z files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Most email applications, such as Microsoft Outlook, Apple Mail, and Mozilla Thunderbird, support compressed S/MIME messages. However, if an email program does not handle compressed data, a P7Z file may appear as an attachment (smime.p7z) to the email message.

description: A P7Z file is a compressed file that contains an email message in the S/MIME encryption standard. It was introduced by Microsoft Corporation and is categorized as Email related data file. P7Z files have application/pkcs7-mime media type. It contains one or more parts of a message that is compressed with zlib compression algorithm.
A P7Z file is an email message compressed in the S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) standard. It contains one or more parts of a message compressed with zlib compression.
